AddMedia.summary: Add new media to user's queue. Creates new items in a queue according to formats specified in the XML API request.

action.description: The action to be performed in the API request.

source.description: Source media file. Must be specified only for AddMedia and AddMediaBenchmark actions.

notify.description: Can be either an HTTP(S) URL for the script with which the result will be posted, or a mailto: link with email address for which the result info will be sent.

notify_encoding_errors.description: Can be either an HTTP(S) URL for the script or a mailto: link with email address for which result info will be sent only if media finished with encoding errors.

AddMediaBenchmark.summary: Add new media to user's queue and sets a flag to NOT process automatically after downloading. Format fields can be specified as well. If NotifyURL is set, a notification will be sent after the media is ready for processing.

action.description: The action to be performed in the API request.

source.description: Source media file. Must be specified only for AddMedia and AddMediaBenchmark actions.

notify.description: Can be either an HTTP(S) URL for the script with which the result will be posted, or a mailto: link with email address for which the result info will be sent.

notify_encoding_errors.description: Can be either an HTTP(S) URL for the script or a mailto: link with email address for which result info will be sent only if media finished with encoding errors.

UpdateMedia.summary: Replace information about existing media's formats. All old format items will be deleted and the new ones will be added.

mediaid.description: A unique identifier for each media. This field must be specified for the following actions: UpdateMedia, ProcessMedia, CancelMedia, GetMediaInfo, GetStatus.

ProcessMedia.summary: Start encoding the previously downloaded media (ones that have been added with an AddMediaBenchmark action).

mediaid.description: A unique identifier for each media.

CancelMedia.summary: Delete specified media and all its items in the queue.

mediaid.description: A unique identifier for each media.

GetMediaList.summary: Returns a list of the user's media in the queue.

GetStatus.summary: Returns information about a selected user's media and all its items in the queue.

mediaid.description: A unique identifier for each media.

GetMediaInfo.summary: Returns video parameters of the specified media when available.

mediaid.description: A unique identifier for each media.
A unique identifier for each media.

RestartMediaErrors.summary: Only retry tasks ended with error.

mediaid.description: A unique identifier for each media.

RestartMediaTask.summary: Only restart the specified task (format). Additional parameter <taskid> must be specified.

mediaid.description: A unique identifier for each media.

StopMedia.summary: Stop media downloading/processing/uploading. If at least one destination is saved, media will be finished, otherwise it will be stopped.

mediaid.description: A unique identifier for each media.
